main event: Three airmen observed a round, multi-colored object in the sky over Stewart Air Force Base, which was later identified as the star Sirius.
interesting points: The object was seen flashing red, green, white, and blue colors., The object appeared stationary and moved slowly back and forth over the base pond., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., The airmen had a clear view of the object without any optical aids., The star Sirius was confirmed as the object observed by a later investigation.
